content: this legal document is about a divorce case between two parties they have reached a mutual agreement regarding their marriage property and children they have divided their assets made arrangements for custody and support of their children and settled their debts they have also made provisions for their pension savings and outstanding balance insurance the parties will be responsible for their own lawyers fees and the court costs and notary fees will be divided equally between them the divorce process is in its final stage and will become official once it is notified to third parties and registered with the civil registry certain clauses in the divorce agreement will take immediate effect the parties have paid the necessary fees and signed the execution deed at the notarys office the notary has verified their identities and certified the document as a true copy the parties acknowledge the obligations imposed on the notary and confirm that they have been fully informed of their rights and obligations
